Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: I purchased the LN52A550 about a month ago. Great product. Alot of LCD buyers wish they would have bought a larger unit after their initial purchase. I had planned on purchasing the LN46A550. I could upgrade to the 52' for a few hundred dollars more. A no brainer. Great color and deep blacks. Great matte finish for no glare in a sun bright room. No regrets.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: Felix Fidelibus
Reviews.Content: Since ordering my Samsung, I have nothing but good things to say about it.  The resolution is awesome, the setup was very easy.The whole purchase experience was not difficult at all and the price was amzazing.Make sure when ordering that you also buy HDMI cables ahead of time to ease with the installation.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Sam Sagar
Reviews.Content: I was looking for 52" SAMSUNG for about 6months. I was considering the LN46A630 as it had 120hz but the screen size was small and 120hz was waste of money in my humble opinion. So I finally decided on this TV.Price:At the time of purchase, the price at amazon.com was the best price I have a seen from reputable seller plus the $200 GC from Samsung made it even sweeter.Shipping:The delivery was thru CEVA and I was a bit worried. The delivery guys were professional. They unpacked the TV attached the stand and set it up on floor as I did not have my TV stand ready at the time. They made sure the TV was working before they left. I also noticed that their truck was half full of all kinds of HDTV's so they must be experienced doing this stuff.TV:It is heavier for a single person to handle carefully. The picture was amazing. The factory settings are OK to get started but try changing the settings and you will get the picture that you like in a few minutes.For the picture brightness, you can change the brightness settings OR change the Power Saving Mode to HIGH setting this will reduce the brightness of the picture and also reduce the power consumption. These is a lot information on calibration settings in the internet for this TV that will give you an idea to get started but there is not much to calibrate as some nerd squads make you think.I am watching this TV at a distance of 10 feet and it is perfect. I have not tried Bluray but the standard OTA signals in 720p and 1080i look amazing. 480 signals look OK but this TV is not built for 480 signals.I am happy with the 60hz. I was into getting a 120hz but after watching the difference between them at a local store, I decided that is is not worth the additional $$$. I would spend the additional money on getting a nice Bluray player. I personally feel that 120hz is more of a hype created by the manufacturers.The sound is OK to get started but I hooked up my Home Theater after a few mins of setting up the TV. It does not do justice to use this TV without a home theater system. I wish Samsung just not include the speakers and give us a price break for the speaker costs.I wanted a Samsung HDTV and now that I have one, I could not be more pleased. Highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A550 Great...but...
Reviews.Author: James Lash "jlash56"
Reviews.Content: Great quality, only thing keeping it from 5 stars is the lousy speaker quality. If you have a home theater system, not an issue, if not, you may have to do what I did...which was buy one. I do love this tv.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding picture from Samsung, Outstanding Delivery from Amazon
Reviews.Author: nigelengr
Reviews.Content: Simply put, the Samsung 52A550 is an excellent TV.  I have no worries about potential glare because this is in my basement. That said, this TV has the matte screen vice the glossier "Clear Panel" on the 650. After calibrating with DVE (not professional, but good enough for me at least), this set is a sight to behold. If you are seated too close (3-5 ft), you will see blurring during fast motion, but I highly doubt even 120Hz sets would rectify that at such a close distance. The set compared to my other HD LCDs, has a good SD picture but, as expected, HD is where it really shines.  After thinking my FiOS connection looked great, I put in a Blu-Ray movie and was very impressed. Additionally, PS3 and Wii games and activities look great.  I was a little more nervous about the Wii since it doesn't have HD output, but with the component cables (never tested the Composite), things look great. Upscaling DVDs don't look like blu-ray, but do look like HD. Haven't tested VHS tapes to date. For those who complain about the sound...if you are going to spend $1500 and up on a TV, whether it's Samsung, Sony, or any other manufacturer, just spend another $150-$200 on a basic surround sound system.  Even the basic ones will perform well.  I had an existing HT setup, so didn't worry about that.  Yes, the TV speakers are tinny and weak and the SRS (virtual surround) doesn't really work unless you are in a closed off room (open floor plans, need not apply).  You could argue that for the money, you should get premium sound...I just say the price of your set would increase by 25-50 percent, if not more. Outstanding sound in a small package is a challenge and these are TV manufacturers.  You can't convince me that a different manufacturer suddenly has premium sound whether or not the speakers point out or down.Lastly, I was extremely nervous (but the price trumped that) about the delivery service.  I was even more nervous when my email said I had Pilot and not CEVA.  Obviously, I cannot speak for Pilot nationwide, but in the Philadelphia area they were excellent (the set was delivered to Delaware County just outside the city prior to them driving out to my place in Chester County).  The day after I ordered, they called to set up an appointment and gave me an afternoon window.  They showed up during the first half of that window a week after ordering.  Yes, one of the guys looked like he was in a gang before he tried his hand at delivery, but I could care less about that than about the services rendered.  They verified they had the correct address and carried the TV into the house and set it down.  I wondered if that was it when the lead guy pulled out the paperwork from his back pocket, put it back in, and asked where I wanted the TV.  I told him the basement and showed him where it was. No moans and groans about navigating the landing, he just told the other guy where they were going and moved it downstairs.  After expecting due to all the negative reviews that the journey ended there (and being happy it was at least in the basement, they opened the box, lifted the TV up on my stand, connected the cables, turned it on, did the setup, and had me verify and initial the checklist they had (yes, no BS line about it's cold out, so warm up the TV first).  When I ordered my TV, it didn't even have the banner on the Amazon page for White Glove Delivery, or Enhanced Delivery, just Free Delivery.  All I cared about was getting the TV on the stand, but setting it up was a nice touch.  I would have verified it worked anyway before they left, but again, nice that they did it for me.  After a tip for each of the guys (without them waiting around looking like they were lost), they were on their way. No complaints with Pilot (understanding that they aren't the same everywhere).Bottom line, excellent TV by SamsungRidiculous price by Amazon (30% off when I pulled the trigger)Excellent delivery from Pilot (Philly region)

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Price
Reviews.Author: B. Sadler "ET1(SW)"
Reviews.Content: CC was going out of business here in town and I was determined to get the best deal I could on a new TV. They wouldn't budge on an open box LN52A550 from $1600. Although I thought this was a good deal at the time...I just felt I could do better. Christmas came and went, the store closed, and I had not purchased a TV...in fact I was kicking myself for not buying the TV at that 1600 price. I then found the same TV, for 1498 w/ what was advertised as "free shipping" and it was out of state, so tax free. I jumped on it. Then through the course of the purchase, I learned that there was a $58 shipping fee. Anyway, besides the horrible shipping conditions, and shoddy delivery service chosen by Amazon, the TV has been great! The picture is beautiful, sharp, clear, bright, and rich. The speakers are on the bottom and back, which take away from it's ability to get the sound out to you on the couch, but they do a good job until you can get a surround system. The controls are easy and comfortable. I don't like that "TV" is always selected for a source to view, since I'm not using it should be grayed out like the rest. I am very happy with my purchase and would buy the same TV again.

Reviews.Title: Samsung

TV is awesome - have watached many sporting events and action movies in the last month and havent noticed any delay that you read about with 60hz LCD's.

I also like the matte finish screen since we do get some reflections in the room. I opted against the 650 model since I don't need the added color on the frame and the extra contrast and inputs.

There were just some slight smudge marks on the screen border and stand from the stickers that mostly came off with some cleaner.  I also own the LN46a550 and my family and I love both! The PIP only works with an analog signal.  I didn't realize this before I made the purchase.  2.  When watching football the image sometimes has a hard time keeping up with the action and you will see a partially blurred picture.  This set is great for watching movies and regular television however.

Reviews.Title: Samsung  LCD 1080 P 52"
Reviews.Author: A. falls
Reviews.Content: Great t.v. Excellent price. No sales tax and free shipping. Very pleased with purchase. Hundreds cheaper than any stores I went to, including COSTCO.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD "It's AWESOME"
Reviews.Author: DVols "DVols"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV along with the Samsung Blue Ray DVD player and three of the 1.3 HDMI cables offered via Amazon for a very reasonable price. The TV is AWESOME. I did an extensive research on all similare type LCD TV's (52 inch) and have found the Samsung 52A550 to be just incredible. The picture is crystal clear and the hookup process was easy. I was worried about the 60hz vs 120hz and have found that I cannot tell the difference. There are some fuzzy images in the backgrounds on various channels but that is more likely the type of camera used and not the TV. When you go to true HD viewing (ie ESPN, HGTV) the picture is beyond words. Either way, HD or Standard viewing, this TV performs. When I used the Blue Ray DVD player. OMG, what a picture. All in all I am very pleased with this purchase and would recommend this TV to anybody, espcecially for the price. Also, regarding the glare, there is NONE. I was amazed.  As for the white glove dilevery, that was great too. The driver from Pilot Trucking drove to my door, unloaded and unboxed the TV, made sure it worked and took the trash out with him when he left. All in all excellent service. Thanks AMAZON....

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Mike in STL
Reviews.Content: I chose the LN52A550 becuase it had a non glare screen. The picture is excellent. There is motion blur as with all LCD's but you have to look for it to notice it on this TV. The 5MS response time helps to minimize the effect. If you have a room with windows this is a great choice.Amazon's price was excellent and the shipping company CEVA was on time and made sure everything worked. This is the second TV I have bought from Amazon. Two of my freinds also purchased TV's from Amazon with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV, no complaints
Reviews.Author: A. Pauley
Reviews.Content: I bought this in May 2008 and could not be happier with my decision. If you are condsidering this TV you may also be looking at the 6, 7, or 8 series Samsung LCDs of the same size. I did not find the faster refresh rate worth the money to upgrade to the 6 series, and one feature I like on this TV that the higher series change is the screen protector. This TV has a typical LCD screen, where as the higher level "touch of color" models put a reflective piece in front of it. This is just a matter of opinion, but for day-time viewing there is less glare with this screen.Picture quality is excellent, I play lots of Xbox 360 and watch lots of movies (DVD, HD-DVD, Blu Ray) in full 1080p and the picture is stunning. The other TV I was considering (similar in size/price) was the 50" 1080p Plasma from Samsung. When it came down to it I got a better deal on this one and that pushed me to this set, but here is what I considered with the plasma-Plasma has deeper colors  (+)Uses more power (although it can be calibrated to help) (-)Plasma has a glass screen=more reflective in daytime viewing (-)If you are looking for an everyday, anytime use TV, this will be a good choice. If you are a hardcore gamer, have a darker room with no windows/low light, then plasma may be the way to go, and if you want to shell out the extra cash, go for a model with the 120Hz refresh rate, but personally I did not find it worth the money.The only complaint I have about this TV is the sound- not so great. My wife prefers to just turn on the TV and watch it (not deal with the receiver, just stick with the basics) and she is not bothered by the sound, but I have it hooked up to surround sound (most of you probably will) and therefore I could care less how the stock speakers sound. I will probably be purchasing a smaller version of this same set later on for regular viewing and move the 52" into a game/movie room, and at that point the TV speakers will be disabled. Just something to keep in mind if you don't plan on using this set with a surround sound system.

Reviews.Author: R. ZENG
Reviews.Content: Beside the excellent picture quality, I really like the USB connection. I can put many of my photos on the wall with huge picture frame.The delivery was as good as you get. Two days earlier than Amazon.com estimated. Service guys were very professional.

Reviews.Title: samsung 52 inch
Reviews.Author: Warren G. Murphyt "warren g murphy"
Reviews.Content: I bought the samsung 52 inch lcd tv and i am very pleased with my purchase so far.i would recomend this tv to anyone who hasnt made there mind up.best picture ive seen on a television and so many extra functions.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic picture for the price
Reviews.Author: Kevin A. White "Irritated from Atlanta"
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is excellent, great value for money. Sound average, but with a screen this size a 5.1 or 7.1 sound system is essential for the full affect.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Matthew Owen
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV a little over a month ago, and have been extremely satisfied with this purchase.  I was a little concerned because of what others had said about SD broadcasts looking worse than their CRT TV, but I've found that after calibrating the TV, the picture for SD digital broadcasts is just fine.  It does pail in comparison to 720p and 1080i that some stations broadcast, as expected.  Those pictures are simply amazing.  I highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Simply Increadable!
Reviews.Author: R. Precourt
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with this TV.  I've always loved the Samsung LCD TVs and feel that they have a much better picture than other brands, but this one is amazing!  Picture is brilliant and has the most vibrant and true colors I've seen.  I enjoy watching TV more than I ever thought possible (and this is my 3rd HDTV.)  I also love having a 3rd HDMI input right on the side as well as USB.  I highly recomend this product and especially recomend purchasing it through Amazon, as I saved nearly $800 overall compared to buying it elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: samsung LN52A550 52 Inch 1080P LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: khanh "Okinawa"
Reviews.Content: My family and I realy enjoy this great brand name Samsung LN52"A550 1080 LCDHDTV. We have do researched finaly we decided to buy this model.The price is better than local store plus free shipping and handling.  Thank you

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52" LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Joni "Joni"
Reviews.Content: Completely satisfied with fantastic picture, price and service. Amazon's white glove delivery was exceptional...delivery service set up and tested TV, they were excellent! I have purchased many items from Amazon over the years, but this was the biggest ticket item; at first I was a little apprehensive, but Amazon has always provided outstanding customer service and delivery. They did not let me down! I highly recommend the Samsung television and Amazon for any purchase.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Guy C "g"
Reviews.Content: First time I've ever had an lcd tv, and it was worth the wait. This tv is fantastic for the price. Don't think you can really beat samsungs picture quality, I've done a lot of side by side shopping and this one is the best.  I have very low tech hook ups and don't expect a lot from a tv, but this one really has "wow"ed us.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52in HD-LCD 1080
Reviews.Author: Marcanthony Salvatini
Reviews.Content: Great picture; display is awesome. I did a fair amount of research before buying and Samsung is on par with and many say better than Sony. I used Amazon as the best price at the time at any retailer  (Best Buy, Circuit City, etc)was a least $700 higher (1700 vs 2499). That doesn't count the free shipping and no sales tax. Great product, great price. Doesn't get much better

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the price
Reviews.Author: TMF
Reviews.Content: I am extremely pleased with my purchase.  I work in video, so I knew the good deal that I was getting with this model, but I was a bit timid about such a large purchase online.  The TV arrived and the freight carrier brought it in and unpacked it for me to check it.  Everything was in good shape, and after the installation the TV is as good as advertised.  The unexpected feature that I like the most is the ability to play a slide show of digital pictures via the USB port.  It's pretty cool.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Purchase
Reviews.Author: David Holloway
Reviews.Content: Just purchased the Samsung 550 model and couldn't be happier.  The purchase from Amazon went flawless.  Being from the older generation it was a challenge buying something I could not physically see.  I have purchased many things through Amazon of a smaller monetary value and knew they could be trusted.  So I put my fears aside and made the plunge.As I was waiting for my Samsung to be delivered I went back on Amazon's website to get the dimensions to wall mount the tv.  I found the price had dropped $30.  I gave the customer service department a call and true to their word they sent me a refund of the $30.  I know this sounds like a scripted promotion for Amazon but great experiences should be shared.After literally months of research between LCD and Plasma.  The Samsung 550 LCD got my vote for best picture and best price.  Time will only tell but so far so good

Reviews.Title: Excellent HDTV....Great Value for the Price!!
Reviews.Author: M. zeglen "Starman"
Reviews.Content: I spent months researching HDTV's on-line and in stores, debated between 46" or 52" and then came across this Samsung on Amazon.  Besides the tv's specifications and features, the overall positive reviews on this site were influential in my purchasing decision.  Although hesitant to make such a large purchase on-line, I decided to pull the trigger and go with this 52A550  and have had absolutely no regrets!  The picture is awesome.  The images are crisp, clear with vivid colors and dramatic contrast.  The speakers are average and certainly adequate for routine viewing.  The sound can be improved somewhat by tweaking the equalizer function, but is lacking in treble and bass.  However, teamed up with a home theater system, the sound is awesome and the tv speakers become a moot point.  Even the remote is impressive.  Sleek, ergonomic styling with full functionality, large buttons and an optional backlight--nice.  CEVA delivery was flawless. They e-mailed me when ready to deliver and were out the next morning. Very courteous and polite, they unpacked the tv (swivel stand attached), set it up on the stand, made sure everything was in working order and went over all the box contents with me.  Very pleased with all that. Price is excellent.  Same tv at the local BB and CC was $450+ more,PLUS 6% sales tax. Even received a $116.00 Amazon credit from their 30 day (from shipping date) price drop policy! Free shipping and set-up,no sales tax, Amazon price credit----an excellent buy and great value!

Reviews.Title: Sweet!
Reviews.Author: James M. Mckinney
Reviews.Content: Love this TV! As with all HD televisions, you really need at least a digital signal to get the best picture. An HD signal is even better. If you don't have either of these, then the picture may actually appear worse than on a tube TV. In other words, if you only have analog cable or a broadcast signal, this TV (and others like it) won't do you much good (except on DVD or other high quality sources). Your situation should improve when broadcast signals go to digital next year.The only things I don't like about this TV are more quibbles than anything else. I wish I could turn off the chimes that play when the TV is turned on or off. Those seem unnecessary to me. The 32 inch Samsung we have allows you to do this, but this one doesn't. Also, I don't see a way to add text to the channels in the list. I don't think this TV has that option, so you either have to know your channels by heart or have a guide handy. The remote doesn't operate a VCR/DVD unless you have a Samsung player with that capability. That option is only on their high-end players, so it's mostly worthless.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52 incher
Reviews.Author: Dennis G. Lange
Reviews.Content: WOW... Great deal. Picture looks awesome. 2008 olympics motion picture looks great. Menu options are user friendly. I pluged in my USB mem stick with pictures to show a Slide show and it worked flawless. Very happy. Shipping was faster than expected... Smooth transaction. A++++++++++ did I mention I am very impressed with amazon.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV at a decent price
Reviews.Author: FrogRacing
Reviews.Content: This TV works great and it is probably one of the best deals of the moment for a 52" LCD. The PIP is a little bit tedious to use especially that the main source cannot be the TV but one of the external source (the TV/Cable can only be the sub-picture).The delivery that was supposed to be by 2 people in house, ended up just being a single guy that I had to help to get the TV out of the box. They just turn the TV on and check that we have sound and image and that's it. They also recommend you to keep the box for a month in case you have to return the TV (the TV has to be sent back in the original box). So this delivery service is not that useful.

Reviews.Title: Awesome new TV
Reviews.Author: Alex J. Serafin
Reviews.Content: I got this TV as an upgrade to a 42" Samsung plasma TV.  So far, I have loved every minute.  Do not listen to any of the negative complaints about the poor sound.  If you're spending 1700+ on a set like this, then you've probably (or should) have an equally impressive surround system.  This having been said, it is still worth your time to use the sound calibration that is under the reviews.  The display is simply amazing.  I would recommend checking out [...] and searching for calibration profile to get the best picture out of your new TV.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Rich D. "Rich D."
Reviews.Content: We've been watching our 52" Samsung for 4 weeks and love it.  Since we tend to hold on to TV's for a long time, I have contemplated the brand and features of big screen HD TV for years and this TV exceeds my expectations.First is the decision over size.  Where we put the TV is not a big room but with all the friends with big screens  I queried, none said they wished they got a smaller TV.  If they were to buy again they'd buy larger!  A 46" would have been fine but I convinced my wife to go 52" and it is outstanding to view even at 10 ft away.This set has plenty of hook-ups for electronic gadgets.There are technical measurements of brightness, clarity,  sharpness and picture refreshing.  Take a trip to BestBuy and check out all the competition.  I did and this set is second to none.  Also remember, it won't be long and another generation of TV's with better numbers will be out, so just buy it now and enjoy it.You must do your homework to see how much more HD TV is going to cost you per month.  In my case by bundling tv, internet and telephone with Comcast, it is costing much less than it did before.There are negative reviews on sound and suggestions on settings to improve sound.  I like the sound and there are many ways to enhance it.  My suggestion is to use the Custom setting but not use any (-) positions.Buy with Amazon.  I ordered on a Sunday and the TV was delivered the following Thursday.  The delivery men carried it in, unpacked it, hooked up to cable, DVD and power, turned it on, ran a check thru the stations and gave instructions on the features to us before our sign off and their departure.At $1800 this set is at least $500 less than BestBuy when you factor in sales tax. There are no shipping charges with Amazon, I don't know about BestBuy delivery.Have patience getting used to the new controls and don't be surprised to find you will be spending more time watching TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at the right price
Reviews.Author: Axton Boy
Reviews.Content: After six months of research, my wife and I decided to purchase this TV. Not a moment of regret. Set up was a snap and the ability to 'tweak' the sound and picture is a nice feature. Delivery (by CEVA) was flawless, actually arrived two days before promised.As mentioned by others, the sound is a little weak. How noticeable this is depends on what type of TV you are replacing.A nice set for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Spectacular HD Video
Reviews.Author: V. R. Maribojoc
Reviews.Content: Just received Samsung LN52A550 52" LCD model, and connected HD camcorder thru HDMI and picture quality is excellent, also set up to view HD & SD channels off-air antenna for broadcast and was amazed how vivid channels displayed. Sound was decent, but recommend Hi-Fi surround sound system for overall satisfaction. Did my research comparing many different LCD & plasma brands and this was the best price for the normal features it offers with this particular Samsung LN52A550 52" model, very pleased with purchase from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great Set and Service!
Reviews.Author: M. Disla "MD"
Reviews.Content: So far, I love this set. It is sold at a great price and Amazon does a good job taking care of its customers. The delivery company delivered earlier than expected and was very convenient  in setting up an appointment for delivery. Would recommend this set and Amazon to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Chris S
Reviews.Content: We have had tv less than a week. I did a lot of research for my first HDTV purchase and I think this tv gives one of, if not the best combo of size, quality and value. The picture quality is superb and as most of the other posts say...the sound could be better. Although my next purchase will be a surround sound system...the sound tweaks mentioned in another post work wonders in the mean time. The sound is more than adequate.We have HD cable from comcast, but my wife still does not like the way non-HD channels look on the tv (although its no fault of the tv itself). I tried the regular channels in a "stretch mode" to fit the 16:9 screen and do not like the look. I think regular channels look best in 4:3 480P (only negative is black on the left and right of screen). HD channels are perfect and xbox 360 looks fantastic as well.I had no problems with delivery. Two people from CEVA came, opened the box, set up the tv and hooked up the cable. It came in perfect condition and arrived when it was set to arrive. You can track your package on Amazon and CEVA's website. They call you and set up an appointment, although I was given a six hour window.I bought my tv through Amazon even though it was a few dollars more than the cheapest price. I did this because of the other sellers return policies on tv's over 37 inches. Since I was new to Amazon, this was something I could have easily missed. I may have been worried about nothing...but some of the return policies seem a bit less friendly...be sure to look into it before purchase.Overall...very happy with Amazon and Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Love the LN52a550
Reviews.Author: Brandon J. Sos
Reviews.Content: If you are like me you have probably been reading all the reviews to get a good handle on the pros and cons of this TV.  As everyone else has said, this TV does look beautiful, but I'm going to avoid reiterating everyone else's comments and add my additional impressions.A few pro's others have not mentioned.USB Plug - This is a really cool option Samsung added to this set.  My sister returned from Alaska shortly after I set the TV up and for fun I decided to test drive it in front of my friends.  The TV recognized the camera was attached and showed the pictures.  This really impressed my friends and surprised me, since electronic aren't usually that "easy".Control - When I watch movies I like it DARK.  There is a little annoying light on the bottom of the TV that some designer thought was a good idea, I don't.  Luckily you can turn it off and the fisher price sounding start up and shut down melodies.Details - The piano finish bezel, the relative short TV depth and the cap to close off the bottom after you remove the stand all are great details.  When mounted this TV is a thing of beauty and the details add to it.Cons:Cap on the bottom - To make the cap stay on the bottom of the TV, after you remove the stand, you have to insert 2 screws you removed when taking the stand off.  I didn't read the directions close enough and missed this step, so now the TV is hung and the cap doesn't stay in all the way.  It is my fault for not reading the directions close enough, but come on this could have been fixed by designing a better cap.Plugs on the Back - The Plugs on the back face backwards which is not great for slim mounts.  There is about 1 inch between the TV and my wall and I had to cut a relief hole to take pressure off the wires.Boot up time - There is a short lag in the TV boot up time and turning off.  From what I know this is pretty par for the course, but its a little tough to know everything is starting ok.Additional Notes:-Pay attention to how you plug the component cords.  I unfortunately got two of the colors mixed up and was very frustrated for a few hours until I switched them and everything was fine.-TWC used very high compression on their signal.  I didn't know this until I had my 52 incher on the wall (I couldn't see it with my 32 in HDTV).  Don't freak out thinking your TV isn't as good as you though it was because you are noticing compression artifacts, in fact its SO good that you can see them.-I read one review that said CEVA will work with you and they were very right.  I tracked my package until it got here, called CEVA and picked it up from them the next day.  They will deliver it for you, but if you are impatient like me you will want to pick it up too.  Note: The box is really big and filled up a big portion of the back of my Expedition.In conclusion I would highly recommend this TV to anyone of my friends and family.  If your still contemplating STOP and just buy this TV, you will love it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung satisfied
Reviews.Author: Robert Masters "Rmasters3"
Reviews.Content: Have had this about two weeks, and am pleased.  Value is excellent, and have seen the same set at local Best Buy, etc. for $500-$600 more. Had two repair issues that have been handled well and quickly.  The base has unstable and a replacement was send immediately, it arrived damaged and another was sent.  Also had a line at the top of the screen and Samsung had new parts in and installed (at our home)within 4 days. The base issues were probably shipping related, the circuit boards were for an intermittant problem but Samsung didn't quibble.  Picture is excellent, doubt I could be much more satisfied for the money.

Reviews.Title: Malfunction
Reviews.Author: Cheng-Chung Huang
Reviews.Content: After few months normal operation the unit could not display the input from the computer through it's D-connector terminal anymore.

Reviews.Title: They don't make them like it used to.
Reviews.Author: Nala
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV in May 2008 and paid $2,000 for it.  Lately, there are color blocks/stripes showing up on the right side of the screen.  We are a little upset at this.  We are not going to buy another Samsung.  The Sony TV on our second floor was bought in 2003 and it is still working well.

Reviews.Title: Great picture while it lasted
Reviews.Author: mu1yvi
Reviews.Content: Purchased in January 2009. Beautiful picture but wide vertical green stripe suddenly appeared down middle. Lasted 4 yrs 7 months.Repair shop says it's shot. Panasonic 42" bought at same time still going strong.

Reviews.Title: Known defect that Samsung won't address
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Beware - poor quality and poor customer service!  Bought this unit just over 5 years ago, now the right half of the screen only displays colored vertical lines.  Repair technician said the panel is bad and will cost ~ $600 to fix.  I called Samsung, but their call center people won't deviate from the script that says, "sorry, you're out of luck."  It must be a known problem since they created a dedicated website "samsungoowpanelrebate".  Waiting for the class action lawsuit.  In the meantime, I'll be looking at a Sony...

Reviews.Title: Never buy their products
Reviews.Author: Gorddi
Reviews.Content: I bought one of their high end LCD TVs. The remote kept eating batteries so I asked for a replacement. They sent me one after a long process since they didnt want to, but the replacement has the same problem. I asked for a third remote but now my TV is out of warranty so I have to buy a remote. They obviously do not stand behind their products. Do not buy Samsung... they are junk.

Reviews.Title: Broken in less than 4 years
Reviews.Author: Sheila Long
Reviews.Content: TVs used to last 20 years. This one lasted less than 4. Yellow stripe across the screen... The tv is now useless. Will buy a Sony next time. Not impressed with Samsung products.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: kevinmyles
Reviews.Content: This TV was perfect and it has satisified me since the day I had bought it and still have it till this day

Reviews.Title: Samsung HDTV
Reviews.Author: OREN P. REICH
Reviews.Content: This has been one of our best buys. This set has the best picture of any previous sets we have owned and has served us well. The cost was reasonable and I highly recommended this unit to anyone that is looking for a high quality HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Didnt last very long after warranty was up
Reviews.Author: James A "James A"
Reviews.Content: Great price when I got it, in fact counldnt find a better price for almost a year, but ther was a recall on it and that was fixed easy enough but have had other problems and probably won't get a Samsung again, unless giving a great extended warranty

Reviews.Title: Samsung Ticket # 5103796219]
Reviews.Author: UNHAPPY CUSTOMER
Reviews.Content: SAMSUNG HAS HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! I PURCHASED A $2600 TV THAT ARRIVED BROKEN!! I CALLED CUSTOMER SERVICE AND THEY SAID IT IS NOT THEIR PROBLEM, BE VERY CAUTIOUS OF THIS COMPANY!!

Reviews.Title: TV will now power up.
Reviews.Author: Sad_TV
Reviews.Content: Had TV for 3 years and now it will now power up. I think I should have gotten more then 5 years for a $1800 TV. Called Samsung and they will cover the repair if it's related to the power supply or capacitors.

Reviews.Title: Ghosting issue resolved
Reviews.Author: M. Polasek "Miss Martha"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this model in Oct 2008 with no problem until recently.  Screen started ghosting and was darker on the right side of the screen.  I contacted Samsung support and did a "live chat". The tech asked me a bunch of questions and then had me reset the whole thing to the original factory settings and problem was solved! He had me use the remote that came with the TV and press and hold down the EXIT button until the TV turned itself off. Then, I turned the TV back on and went through the setup process and TV screen was back to normal.  I like doing live chats because it seems I always get better service than when speaking to a person over the phone.  Hope this helps anyone having this issue.

Reviews.Title: Great TV For The Price!
Reviews.Author: Samuel C. Lee
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about a year now, and there are no problems whatsoever.  Picture quality is awesome.  HD comes out crystal clear.  Before purchasing this TV, I looked at the 6 and 7 series, Sony XBR8, and some plasmas.  All had very good picture quality, but not enough to be worth the extra hundreds of dollars.  I watch mostly sports, and a lot of people say that the 60 hz isn't optimal for it.  I think it's fine.  The lag isn't very noticeable unless you compare it side by side.Sound quality is pretty good considering that they're TV speakers.  At factory settings, they were a little mid-y, but it can easily be adjusted through the menu to produce decent sounding speakers.  If you want the best sound, you shouldn't be listening through a TV anyway.  So for what it is, the sound is pretty good.Features-wise, the 550 is much more limited than the 750, but I figured I'm not going to do much with the TV besides watching it.  I think one neat feature of the 750 is that it can be hooked up through a LAN so that your computers can communicate with your TV.  I don't really need that though, so the 550 was perfect for my purposes.Overall, I'm very satisfied with my purchase.  This is one of Samsung's cheapest, full 1080p TVs out.  I recommend it to anyone that's looking for a TV, but is on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Great Television, Great Value
Reviews.Author: Vasilios Douvikas
Reviews.Content: I bought this television on Black Friday 2008 at Black Friday prices which included a free Samsung Blu-Ray player. Over a year later and two moves, the television still has a great picture and a great appearance. In fact I have purchased 2 other Samsung 550 series televisions for my parents and they love the picture also.

Reviews.Title: Smart decision
Reviews.Author: D. Devine
Reviews.Content: Everything in great working condition.  I was concerned about sound because I live on the water.  Sound is awesome.I am big sports fan and heard concerns about 60HZ vs upgraded models.  I am very happy with model and purchase was a very good move.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Shawn Adams "Dune"
Reviews.Content: I have owned this TV for going on a year now. It has been fantastic. The picture quality is insanely clear. I've watched plenty of fast action sports and could not discern any "motion blur" whatsoever. There's literally tons of info on the internet as how to tweak the color settings in the TV's menus to make it really pop out and to save you some life out of the set. The set itself is really beautiful as well. We've had tons of compliments on the asthetics and piano finish. Overall a fantastic buy..especially at what it is now compared to when I bought mine. Good luck and happy viewing.

Reviews.Title: NICE QUALITY TV
Reviews.Author: Burg Buff
Reviews.Content: This tv has an outstanding picture!All functions were easy to operate.Setting up the picture quality was a lot easier than I was led to believe.The only knock I have against this tv is the sound system.Very mediocre.Since I am am using a seperate sound system anyway this problem is notreally an issue for me.I would suggest anyone purchasing this tv to considerdoing the same,but otherwise a tv well worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Time to buy!
Reviews.Author: DebofAmber
Reviews.Content: Between the recession and the introduction of the 240Hz LCD TV's, the price for this big beauty is down nicely.We watch movies, Hi-Def cable shows and kid shows in my family, mostly, and this TV does a fantastic job with each.  If your focus isn't on sports, this is an excellent television and a very good deal right now.If you haven't bought a TV in a few years, or this is a step up, be warned!  there are a lot of options and features to work with.  It is worth your time to learn them, but it does take a little time.  If you routinely upgrade your computers or cell phone every couple years, you'll be fine.  If you don't, be prepared to spend some time learning what this beast of a TV can do for you.I recommend it and would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, also works great with a PC hook up
Reviews.Author: Jane Gallagher
Reviews.Content: I've purchased this TV for about 6 months now and I'm very happy with it. Here's some guidance for new buyers:- Initially I was a little disappointed because when you don't have HD, the image does seem a little pixelated. However, use the Samsung software option in their menus and enable the automatic smoothing, and you'll see quite an improvement.- I hooked up the TV to the computer and it works great. A PC resolution of 1280x800 is sufficient. It's easy to browse the net, watch videos, checks email and type out documents on the TV, it's great. I do recommend a wireless keyboard and mouse with this setup.- If your PC doesn't support PCI-X (PCI Extreme) video cards (which are the cards that handle HDMI output -- and that is desirable because one HDMI cable can carry both video and sound), then you need to hook up 2 cables, one for video (get a long VGA cable) and one for sound (standard 3.5mm RC jack), and connect the 2 cables from the PC to the TV.- Lots of people complain about the sound not being amazing, but you really don't notice any mediocricy if you hook up the TV to a surround sound system. Problem solved.All in all, for me this TV was a really worthwhile investment.

Reviews.Title: This is a nice tv :}
Reviews.Author: S. Gain
Reviews.Content: I've owned this tv for a few weeks and i have to say i am very happy with it. The picture with Xbox 360, Playstation and blu-ray is fabulous.Also a plus is that you hardly get any glare from windows or lights in the screen. Only downside I have really seen is that the speakers in the tv don't have good sound. Though this isn't really a problem considering i don't use them anyways. And the price for the Tv was the cheapest high quality television i could find.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Great!!
Reviews.Author: Needle In the Hay Hay
Reviews.Content: I have had the TV for about a month now and love it! The sound is not the greatest, but if you play with it a little bit you can get it to sound pretty good. I will be buying surround sound soon so it's not a big deal to me. I have not noticed any motion blur (being it's 60hz). Definately recommended! I hope it lasts along time...

Reviews.Title: I own two of them.
Reviews.Author: bloodshot
Reviews.Content: I liked this tv so much, I bought a second. I can't express how clean looking this television is. Mounted on a wall, it really adds to a room. Watching HD content on this tv really makes it shine and with a $1500 price tag, it's tough to beat.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV - LN52A550
Reviews.Author: C. Mason
Reviews.Content: This TV is fantastic.  Colors are sharp, has all the ports you need, and bunch of settings to tweak.  And it's Samsung so quality wise you know you can't go wrong.  The only issue with the TV, which many people have complained about is the sound.  Follow the sound settings from this site, [...] and those sounds settings are gone.  Nothing else to say about the TV itself as it's perfect.Beware of shipping from Amazon's shipping carrier.  They say you get some special handling shipping where the carrier sets the TV up for you to insure it works.  This is not the case at all.  They do the same thing all other shipping carriers do...drop you package off and leave.  If you have this type of shipping make sure you turn the TV and test prior to the shipper departing in case the TV has a defect.  Other than this issue, shipping was EXTREMELY fast when ordering from Amazon directly.

Reviews.Title: The Most Serious WOW for this price EVER!
Reviews.Author: D. Simmons
Reviews.Content: So I did all my homework for months on big HD TV's.  What size, what specs, and how I could BEST spend my money.  After all the research, I confidently went with this....and I have never, never regretted it.  Friends and family, who themselves have big screen TV's, have all commented on how eye popping and absolutely amazing the picture looks.  And with 3 HDMI inputs, it handles my brighthouse cable, Blu-Ray, and my XBOX 360 which is great for those with many different consoles to consider.  The non-glossy is very much the way to go here for all of you considering the 650. I know it features a few more hi-tech features, but for the money difference and the gloss issue, spare yourself, the 550 is the best.  And unless your TV room is mansion huge, 52 inches is perfect, please dont get hung up on sizes larger than that.  My couch sits a good 9-10 feet away and I wouldn't want it any bigger.  I paired this TV with the Samsung HT-TZ512 home theater (~$400) and have been on cloud nine ever since.  The "anynet" feature between samsung components is really nice.  You know, it was such a dillemna for so long, with all the choices out there, and especially given these are such big ticket items.  But this combo is a sincere winner, even for audio/visual philes.  So to sum it up, add this to your cart and dont look back.  And then thank me later :^)

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV
Reviews.Author: hookkicklegend
Reviews.Content: After searching for a few months for the right TV I chose this one and I was not disappointed.  I was contemplating higher models with the auto motion detection, or the 120hz as aposed to the 60hz here, but after comparing it to a few of my friends TV's there was not a noticeable enough difference for me.Bottom line, this is the best bang for your buck and is an amazing TV.Picture is absolutly amazing.

Reviews.Title: Spectacular TV!
Reviews.Author: Raymond F.
Reviews.Content: I'm the kind of guy who, if it cost more than $100, researches before he buys. I did tons of research and read scores of reviews on TVs and finally decided upon the LN52A550. The price was right for such a large screen and the reviews everywhere on the web raved about it. And they weren't kidding.  We received it on a Thursday, and I can still remember my jaw dropping open while watching Survivor that evening.  It looked 3-D! The colors are rich and glorious. I have no trouble with reflected light on the matte screen. The television itself is beautiful with a black lacquer-like finish and will be a welcome addition to anyone's living room. Oh, and I'm really glad I got the 52". I thought about the 48" and was afraid the 52" would be too large for my smallish living room, like I'd be in the front row of a movie theater. But it turned out to be wonderful. I could even see going larger if I had the budget.Some kind soul posted a full lineup of tweaks here on Amazon.com that you can make to the settings to get an ideal picture. Out of the box, I found the sharpness settings to be too much, resulting in what looked like a highly-compressed JPG. Dialing that down and adjusting the black levels a bit resulted in a stunning image. I did wrestle with skin tones for a few days, until I realized that some of NBC's studio footage just appears off to my eye. For example, NBC Nightly News host Brian Williams always looks a little bluish to me sitting behind his anchor desk, but then they cut away to a reporter in the field and the skin tones look fine. The Tonight Show with Jay Leno looks a little heavy in the magenta to me, but other shows/commercials look fine. After a day or two, I decided to leave the color at factory settings and just relaxed and enjoyed the picture.  I will say that both of the aforementioned shows, as well as NBC in general, have the sharpest Hi-Def picture of any major network, in my opinion, even if the skin tones are slightly askew.Let me also compliment Amazon.com.  I ordered the TV and it was sitting in my house 48 hours later. No shipping charges, no tax. Amazon is a first-rate retailer that has won my loyalty with their low prices and excellent customer care.By the way, I also ordered a Sony PlayStation 3 as a Blu-ray player, and I'm so glad I did. Yeah, it was about $100 more than a stand-alone player, but it's far more versatile. Besides being able to play Blu-ray discs and DVDs, you also have a gaming system. But more than that, I can connect my computer to the PS3, and via a $20 piece of software called MediaLink, I can access the music, photos and videos on my Mac and display them on the gorgeous LN52A550 screen! It even has a web browser built in, which is a bit awkward to navigate, but brings the web to your living room as well. Again, kudos to Amazon who delivered my PS3 within 24 hours for free!Call me one happy customer who is thrilled with his new home theater purchases.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Michael "Michael"
Reviews.Content: My 27" CRT TV died after "only" 17 years. After much research, which I found more confusing than helpful, I settled on the Samsung LN52A550 based on the recommendation of someone who sells TV's. We have been very, very happy with it for the 2+ months that we have owned and used it. It was easy to connect to our old components (amplifier, DVD player, etc.). The picture quality is phenomenal! I do recommend, however, that you connect some external speakers, like we did. Nothing wrong with the internal speakers, it's just that they are mounted on the back of the unit so you really have to crank up the volume if that's all you have.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for low Prize
Reviews.Author: Le Marc
Reviews.Content: I have purchased two of the Samsung LNXXA550 series, I could say that it is own of the best options on the marked since it has a decent prize. The first one I bought was 40 Inch, later I saw it too small and bought the 52 inch one.Image is pretty clear, the only thing I didn't enjoyed much was the sound, sometimes it was to soft for my taste (Video games), but when you hook it up to a Home Theater or Stereo, it does the magic.It's a nice option, with a great prize and nice features.

Reviews.Title: Addressing the Sound Complaint
Reviews.Author: ilande
Reviews.Content: This television is an excellent product. When I purchased it, I wanted the best TV I could get for the money, so I chose to wait until the newer models were announced and this unit had a price drop. Saving $500 makes you feel a lot better about a purchase, doesn't it?TO ADDRESS THE SOUND COMPLAINT: A lot of people are complaining that the speakers in the TV are crummy. I beg to differ. I am an adult male who enjoys movies and the occasional video game, and I have found these speakers, to although not amazing, are very impressive for not being seen and being kept within the TV itself. If you are worried about the sound quality, and you DO care about sound, but you are not in the upper echelons of the "audiophile" classification, then you will enjoy the sound. It's big, it's whole, it's good. Although, there's not a TON of base, but if you realize there is no subwoofer then no surprise.BEST TV I'VE EVER WATCHED ON, HANDS DOWN. WILL BUY SAMSUNG AGAIN!

Reviews.Title: Best In Class
Reviews.Author: R+
Reviews.Content: I did a good two weeks of research before selecting a TV and I'm 100% happy with my choice. Samsung is a leading manufacturer of LCD panels and actually sells their screens to other companies -- and their expertise shows. The screen is amazing, especially when calibrated properly, and at much lower cost than some other brands (which may be using a Samsung screen anyway!). The number and variety of rear inputs is impressive and will suit my needs just fine. The actual TV housing is sleek and arrived without a scratch. No dead pixels on mine either. I really can't say much else than buy it now -- I couldn't bring myself to purchase any other 52" LCD TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52 in. LCD
Reviews.Author: Stephen J. Miller
Reviews.Content: I found this Television to be an outstanding value.  The picture is amazingly sharp.  Darks, lights, and colors are all of very high quality.  In addition the menus for adjusting the picture, color, and other aspects of the television are clear and fairly easy to get to.  All in all the set has an excellent picture and is user friendly.  In addition, the price could not be beaten anywhere else I shopped.  The only detractor from the entire buying experience was the shipping.  Delivery took 4 days longer than expected.  However, I did use the free shipping, and when the set did arive the delivery company set it up for me and checked the television to be sure it was working properly.  That is pretty impressive for a free service, so the extra couple of days was worth it.  I am fully satisfied with my purchase and feel I got an excellent deal.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: LIKE GOOD PRODUCTS
Reviews.Content: This  TV was a good price from Amazon. Worked well right out of the box. I was worried about this model because there were newer ones out. If you are looking for great picture and price, this is the tv for you. If you can find one now. The sound is not great but just hook it up to the stero. you will love it!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 550 LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Lester P. Smith
Reviews.Content: I have been looking at the 52" LCD's for a while and finally decided on the Samsung 550. It is everything I wanted as far as picture quality. I do have a complaint with the sound. It doesn't have the quality that I was expecting. I am looking for a reciever and surround system now for it. I have always planned on adding a receiver anyway, so the sound quality isn't much of an issue. Other wise it is a great product.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: J. Morgan
Reviews.Content: So far I have really enjoyed this TV. After careful consideration I decided on the 52" 550 over the 46" 650. They were roughly the same price and so I decided on the bigger 52" over the slightly better picture quality and 120HZ of the 650. So far I am happy with my decision. This set has very nice blacks and many adjustments to make the picture look great. I recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52 inch
Reviews.Author: E. Bay
Reviews.Content: We love our new TV from Amazon.  We received it the same week in which we ordered it and it was brought into the house and set up in the location which we wanted it by the driver of the carrier.  I would recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Another Great Samsung Product
Reviews.Author: Bodhi
Reviews.Content: I purchased this without an extended warranty- Great TV!  Amazon/CEVA delivered early and I live in the country hundreds of miles from their shipping locations.  Samsung may have a rough customer service team but you hardly need it!  I have a samsung BDP-2550 hooked to it through HDMI and picture is great!

Reviews.Title: Real Nice! Just like a piece of furniture!
Reviews.Author: Davey S. Wong "b-balldsw"
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this LCD and really enjoy the picture! Sound is Ok, but will get surround sound. Back to the picture, it's amazing especially the HD channels, such as Animal Planet, HDNet, HGTV and the Food Network!Another plus, is the overall clean and sleek design! The price was too low to pass up, Delivery was very smooth. For all you, future buyers, definitely consider purchasing through the Internet, you will save money!! Go with the Samsung LN52A550!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: K. Reynolds
Reviews.Content: I got a great deal on this tv through Amazon.  [...]  Love the set but worth noting is that the picture quality is not at its peak unless you are getting broadcast in digital.  I would highly recommend this set if you get the same deal that I did. (even without the promotional from NFL)Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV
Reviews.Author: Old Lady "Techno stupid"
Reviews.Content: The new set was delivered quickly and set up was fairly easy.  We love the size and picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Matthew Blackburn
Reviews.Content: This is my first LCD tv. I was very nervous about buying on online. I wanted a Samsung but it seemed like it was kind of a crap shoot with getting a good one or a bad one with the rebooting issue but i decided  to go for it anyway. I couldnt be more happy. I love the tv. The picture is amazing. Sound isnt that great but i use surround through an amp so doesnt effect my tv watching. The 6 or 7 series does have a better picture i know. But i myself just couldnt get past the red touch of color design. I think samsung realy dropped the ball with that whole thing they have the best picture hands down but really screwed up with that design. So i went with the 5 series and i could not be happier. Ive had my tv or a month now and no rebooting issues so ill keep my fingers crossed. I would deffinitley recommend this tv to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great delivery and great TV
Reviews.Author: John Horton
Reviews.Content: I was nervous about ordering such a large item from Amazon without delivery and set-up but when the Pilot shipping subcontractor arrived (as scheduled) he brought the carton in, unpacked the TV, placed it on the stand, plugged it in, put batteries in the remote, turned on the TV, connected the HDMI cable I already had, and made sure everything worked properly - all within 10 minutes - then removed all the packing materials.  I was very relieved about this service.  The TV has a very crisp and detailed picture, even on non HD channels or sources.  The sound is also of good quality.  I am not technically brilliant and did not interconnect the TV with surround sound or tweak the picture fron the factory settings.  It just looks and sounds great.  It is connected to a DirecTV HD receiver and an old combo VHS/DVD player.  I don't watch enough movies to justify a blu-ray player.  Both the TV and Amazon at $500 cheaper than the the Navy Exchange or Best Buy sale price with tax and great delivery service was, in my opinion, a great decision.  John H.

Reviews.Title: LIVING UP TO EXPECTATIONS
Reviews.Author: R. L. ALLEN "COGIT8"
Reviews.Content: I chose this Samsung because the 46 inch version of this model was the best-rated one in its size in Consumer Reports (which I trust for everything).  The picture is excellent, the onscreen menus logical, clear and easy to use.  The sound is OK (as noted in CR), but I have a home theater system to make up for that.  The only caveat I have is that there appears to be some sort of issue between Verizon's Motorola set top boxes when hooking up with an HDMI cable.  No serious trouble for me yet, but apparently Motorola and Samsung are pointing fingers at each other.  I have had to unplug the Verizon FIOS set top box a couple of times to get it to reset (the Samsung was reporting "No Signal."  Online blogs seem to think the problems lie with Motorola.  I discovered the problem when I called Verizon about set top box problems with a box hooked to a Phillips TV in the house, and they were surprised that the problem I was reporting was not the Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Television
Reviews.Author: John B
Reviews.Content: So far I have no problems with this television.  It is everything I expected it to be.  Even though I don't watch a great amount of television the lower price allowed me to justify its purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Joel L. Mayo
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV and it came with a super price. I was concerned after reading some of the nightmare stories about the shipper, but I had no problems there at all. Bottom line is that this was a flawless transaction and a super product.

Reviews.Title: Richard"s TV Samsung LN-52A550
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Delivery by Pilot was on schedule. Unpacked item, set it up and took empty carton away.Great picture! See no difference in fast moving scenes compared to the 650 model. Poor sound but, used Christopher Nickels recomended settings(see his Amazon rieview)and sound immproved 90%. I use my home theatre system for music, movies and DVDs, however. Extremely satisfied with this product.I have always been happy with all products I have ordered from Amazon in the past and highly commened them on their service.

Reviews.Title: Great 52" LCD TV...
Reviews.Author: G. Dave
Reviews.Content: Arrived in just 4 days! Could set up in less than 1/2 hour and hoked up to my DISH via HDMI cable. The picture quality is superb in HD mode. Also, hooked up my PS3 and the games look awesome. Blue ray DVDs are just amazing. Sound quality is good when you turn on surround sound mode on TV. However, I intend to hook it up with 7.1 system to achieve full potential of this amazing product.

Reviews.Title: Good quality LCD tv
Reviews.Author: J. Mcmahon
Reviews.Content: Bottom line, this is a good Hi-def LCD tv.  I bought my first one (46" LCD) Samsung from Amazon, and was so impressed that instead of getting something cheaper in another product for my second purchase, I paid a "little" extra for the quality that I knew what I was going to get with the Samsung.  Haven't had any complaints except audio.  It works fine, but the speakers are on the bottom of the flat screen..Hence, if you have a tv cut-out over a fireplace like we do, it may look great, but the sound gets lost in the cut-out...Obviously, this isn't a factor if you're using a seperate audio system...All-in-all, a good quality LCD tv.  I'm hooked on Samsung if I ever have to purchase another one.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for Great Price
Reviews.Author: F. Fowler
Reviews.Content: I have had the LN52A550 for almost a month now and am very pleased with it. It is my first LCD TV and spent several weeks researching different brands prior to purchasing through Amazon.  Amazon had the best price. The matte screen works well in my great room which has three walls of windows/doors. Very little problem with glare. Picture quality is great. Sound quality although downgraded on a lot of reviews is what I would expect from a TV. Never thought any TV would put out great sound without a home theater system. CEVA was the delivery company and did a good job. Scheduled delivery, was on time and did all I asked to check the TV before leaving.If you are looking for a 50" or larger flat screen this is a great buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with the TV
Reviews.Author: L. Kopylovsky
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with this TV. It's incredible with HDTV receiver. The sound is not so great, it's recommended to by separate sound system

Reviews.Title: Great TV - husband loves it!
Reviews.Author: Robin Kelleher
Reviews.Content: No complaints except the tinny sound.  Easily fixed once hooked up to good speakers.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture quality! But...
Reviews.Author: Ra Quazar
Reviews.Content: Great picture. Very easy to set up. The delivery men arrived on time and were very professional. Even wiped their feet on the door mat before entering. The only thing I didnt like was the "feel" of the remote control and the location of its numeric keypad. Holding the remote upside down felt more natural in my hand, than right side up. And changing channels using the keypad was awkward on my thumb. For this, I rate 4 out of 5 stars.Update:  tv started  making loud nonsense noises and picture would be warped  several months after purchase. Fortunately it was still under mfr warranty so samsung sent a  technician over and he replaced the mother board. Okay...tv was working fine up until  fall 2012 when half the screen would black out and/or colors would be all wrong. Tv would flash. Bottom line : tv is no longer viewable. Had to replace. Owned it less than 5 years. Later learned samsung new about this problem with many of their models and offered repair replacement for certain listed models. But not mine. Very disappointed. Never buying samsung again.

Reviews.Title: Great Value for the price!
Reviews.Author: lanman66 "Chris H"
Reviews.Content: I had been looking at both this model and the LN52A650.  Before purchasing either of these, make sure you take a look at it in the store.  Most of the time the settings on the TV in the store are not adjusted optimally, but even still, it should give you a good idea of what it will look like when you get it home.  In my case, looking at identical images on both this and the 650, i could not tell the difference.  I do occasionally notice slight jaggedness on the edges of fast moving images, but generally this is ONLY when i am closer than 5 feet to the screen.  As with any HD set, if you are watching Standard Def tv it will be quite pixelated.I am satisfied with this set, and glad i saved the extra money i would have spent on the 650 or higher models, especially with how quickly the technology is changing!

Reviews.Title: Love My New Samsung
Reviews.Author: Alexandra Guajardo "bargain hunter"
Reviews.Content: I purchased my tv almost a month ago and I have to admit I love it. I had been wanting an LCD for a while but kept talking myself out of it because of the price.  I priced this one at a couple of stores and then at Amazon.  Amazon had the same price but the extended warranties were cheaper, it was free shipping and of course no taxes.  I saved over $250 by purchasing through Amazon than the local stores.  I did find a site that many mention here and found the best settings/calibration for the tv.  I have to say they really do make a difference.  My sister has the exact same tv and mine has a better picture just because of the settings.  Although a lot of people are not impressed with the sound, I have no complaints.  I ordered it on a Monday and it was supposed to be delivered the next Tuesday(a little over a week). Instead I received a call on Wednesday from CEVA and they delivered it on Friday of the same week.  The two guys took it out of the box, set it on my tv stand and hooked it up to make sure everything worked. They offered to take the box with them as well.  My 1 and only complaint is that it hasn't been the full month since I ordered it from Amazon and it's already $110 cheaper.  From reading other posts, I see that they don't reimburse you the difference.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: C. Kallmeyer
Reviews.Content: The TV is fantastic, never had a flat screen before this.  Nice clear picture, can even watch it clearly from the kitchen 25 feet away.Even the box it came in was great, with handles on the sides for easy transport of the big thing.

Reviews.Title: Great LCD Television
Reviews.Author: Richard M. Deteresa "Rich"
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV at an excellent price.  Picture quality at high definition is amazing, and standard def looks great too.  Colors are vibrant, just be sure to select the display mode that fits your room.  I can't really comment on the audio since my set is hooked into a home theater system, so the built-in audio isn't being used.

Reviews.Title: Great TV.  Somewhat outdated compared to new models.
Reviews.Author: TC "Electronics Freak"
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic TV, which I bough over a year ago.  My only gripe is that with the 60hz refresh rate, the screeen jitters a little when watching golf and football, which is why I gave it 4 stars.Regardless, I have no regrets about this unit, and am thinking about buying an updated version for the basement.

Reviews.Title: No regrets
Reviews.Author: Jeff Cheap
Reviews.Content: Very nice tv, and Amazon delivered it perfectly, right on time. Only problem was adjusting the sound like others have mentioned, but once that was done, the tv looks and sounds great.

Reviews.Title: A lot of bang for your buck!
Reviews.Author: A. Freeman
Reviews.Content: 1st, off let me say how happy we were with the white-glove delivery of this product. I was very hesitant to make a purchase like this over the internet, but decided the price on Amazon compared to the retail store price (plus no taxes or shipping) was worth the risk. The delivery was prompt and everything was set up and checked before they left. The service was as good or better than the service I paid for years ago through a local retailing for a similar item - plus it was free!Now, on to the TV itself. I went and looked at TVs this size for weeks before settling on this model. The difference in price between Amazon & a retail store was at least $400, if not more. The picture quality is fantastic, and the non-reflective screen is great in areas where glare/reflection would otherwise be a problem. Overall a really nice TV at a great price.Note:There are some complaints posted here about the sound on this product and it is not fantastic. I did the recommended adjustments, but was still not satisfied. I found it sounded better when I put on a couple of dvds that I was familiar with and adjusted the sound based on what I thought it should sound like - but to each his own. That said I did notice a HUGE difference when using HDMI cables in both the sound and the picture quality. Using the HDMI cables I found no problem with either.

Reviews.Title: samsung tv A-ok
Reviews.Author: SE in NY
Reviews.Content: I've had this tv for a couple of months so far and am very happy with it. It is my first big screen tv.  I spent months looking in all the retail stores and even attempted to buy at one time but the salesperson was pushy and wanted me to buy a $400. extended warranty and extras that I didn't think I needed. I had a budget for what I wanted to spend and didn't want the pressure to spend more than I wanted to, so I left.  With Amazon, there was no pressure.  I just did a little extra homework on the internet and chose this item because of price, quality, good reviews and the major brand name.I used the Amazon credit card with a 2 year 0% financing deal and also found that at the time Amazon had the best price by almost $200 over the big stores.  I was worried about buying over the internet, in case I had to do a return, but other reviewers had said they had no problem with Amazon and that convinced me to buy, especially at such a great price.  The video games look great, the blu ray and hd are great. Good sound but even better through the stereo.

Reviews.Title: Bring On The Super Bowl!!!!
Reviews.Author: Mario
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV on Thursday morning Jan.15th. Amazon gave me a delivery date of Jan.22. TV was delivered to my home on Saturday Jan. 17th at 10am. Wow! I didn't even get to track for days on end. Watched the NFL playoffs on it and the picture was all I was hoping for, no motion blur at all. Having owned a DLP HDTV for the last 3 years, I was sort of unsure about LCD's, the ones I had seen at stores were very pixelated while showing fast motion scenes. I have a 5.1 surround sound system so I don't have an issue with the sound. Picture on HD is very crisp and clear, SD on the other hand is watchable. I'm glad I pulled the trigger and purchased this TV from Amazon, they had the best price, I paid no taxes and recieved fast free delivery. No B&M; store in my area could match that. Buying from Amazon was pain free, no extended warranty pitches from salespeople.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV and Excellent Amazon.com Service
Reviews.Author: J.Go.
Reviews.Content: Received this set within a week of ordering it via CEVA (in Late November 2008). With the factory TV settings, the picture and sound both seemed average. I was disappointed as I had expected a lot more based on the reviews.  With minor tweaks to the settings, the picture and sound quality improved dramatically.  I LOVE this TV now.  The sound isn't too bad either (better than average for TV viewing).  Will probably buy a smaller one for the other room :)

Reviews.Title: Tv lasted for one year and got lines....had to trash it
Reviews.Author: Martin T. Wilde
Reviews.Content: Don't buy unless you get buyer protection plan...I didn't and lost big time....  I paid 1,550.00  12/13/08  good luck and try to buy USA

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV.. we're loving it
Reviews.Author: V. Monforte
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with our TV. I can connect my laptop to it and watch international TV, we also have our Apple TV connected and can rent HD movies which are spectacular on it. Our living room has lots of windows and there is almost no reflection on the screen. The sound could be better but we got a Bose CineMate for about $500 and the sound issue is gone.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV GREAT PRICE
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Hansen "RUMMAGENUT"
Reviews.Content: I AM EXTREMELY HAPPY WITH MY NEW TV AND JUST AS HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE FROM AMAZON.COM

Reviews.Title: Another excellent product from Samsung
Reviews.Author: Ed S.
Reviews.Content: Two years ago I bought a 40" Samsung (720p) and was thrilled.  I've had this 52" for a month and am even more thrilled.  Amazon was great in delivering the set in less than week...delivery guys showed up when they said they would...set is great and was easy to hook-up...no glitches and I did change the sound settings as described in a blog on this site and it really did enhance the audio!  Pricing was great and still less than anything advertised to this point - even though prices on HD TVs continue to fall. The free shipping and no sales tax are hard to compete with.  And I got a $25 Amazon gift card.

Reviews.Title: like mike say JUST DO IT!
Reviews.Author: Jeff Westmoreland
Reviews.Content: Never purchased anything on-line before so was very warry about purchasing a tv for my first purchase. Went to all the chain stores to pick out which tv I wanted, and went back, and went back. Wanted to make sure which one would be the best for me. Everytime I left the stores it was always the 52in 550 series. I tried talking them down to the price that amazon had and they all said they could not go that low. Still was scared to order a big purchase like that on-line. One store even went on-line to check out the price because they said it couldnt be that low. Boy was he surprised, but of course he tried talkin me out of purchasing it from amazon, questioning delivery charge,and if they were even an authorized dealer, if it would be a new tv, and of course the one I was questioning ( big purchase like that on-line) Well after months of searching and my son telling me JUST DO IT!  I did and boy i could not be any happier. Love the tv the price was unbeatable and delievery was smooth and to my schedule. the only bad thing is all the shopping I do on-line now

Reviews.Title: All I can say is Awesome
Reviews.Author: James Morgan
Reviews.Content: I compared several brands and several models. I was torn between this model and the newer 650. I decided for the money difference this was the best buy. I have no complaints other than learning all the bells and whistles. You can sit anywhere in the room and get a clear picture. Yeah, the speakers are not that great. Neither are any of the other makes and models. If you are spending this kind of money on a TV, invest in surround sound. You will not be dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: onawaygram
Reviews.Content: Great picture, and we don't even have Hdtv hookup - just Dish Satelite. Delighted that the screen is so non-glare.  It faces 3 big picture windows that we can leave open.  While it is true that if you look really hard you can see muted images of the windows, they do not distract from the picture. It is a beautiful addition to our living room.

Reviews.Title: This TV is awsome!
Reviews.Author: James T. Gearing "Mad Donkey"
Reviews.Content: I did a good amount of research before deciding on this tv. It is replacing a 36" Sony XBR. In my opinion the only other brand that comes close to the same quality picture is Samsung, and at a much  better price. I ruled out plasma early on, due to the glare the screens give off. That narrowed it down to a Samsung LCD. I spent most of my time comparing the different models. I spent almost and hour looking at this one and the next model up with the 120hz side by side in a bestbuy, and I honestly saw no reason to get anything but this one. The 120hz actually takes away the natural blur that can happen with motion, and instead shows you details that your eyes wouldnt be able to see in real life, its a strange effect that makes things look like they are happening in fast-forward. I prefer to see things closer to reality, even if things blur a bit when moving fast.I thought I'd also mention something kind of hard to find details on, the calibration setting, once you get the tv. Your vision may be different, but these are the setting that worked best for me.*Backlight 2* (This is a light built into LCDs, I found any higher then 3 gave me a headache after 10 minutes, to bright.)*Contrast 75**brightness 52**Sharpness 0* This creates fake white lines on the edges of objects, useful for SD, but in HD it has a negative effect on the picture (really bad on HD games, xbox 360, etc.), even set to 10 - 20 it can ruin a HD picture.All the other "special" setting in the menu should be shut off, they use to make the  TV look brighter for when its on the sales floor, and will only give you a headache if you use them.I spent a good deal of time coming to these settings, hope they help!

Reviews.Title: A - 1
Reviews.Author: Leonel E. Romero
Reviews.Content: The picture quality on the 550 is great. The sound on the other hand is not. You can adjust it to make it sound better, but if you put it in an entertainment mode the sound is not adjustable,and it sounds hollow. That issue was easily fixed once I hooked up my surround sound to it.All in all, I say it's a good TV, I'm satisfied with it. The picture quality is good, colors are vivid, and it's easy to navigate through the menus. I recommend it to anyone who is looking for a lcd and has or will be getting a surround sound system.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Helgersb
Reviews.Content: This TV is excellent and I would reccomend it to anyone.  The picture is excellent, I debated for a long time on getting the 650 but didn't like the red frame or the more expensive price.  With the 5ms response time of the 550 I don't think you could tell the difference between the two.  If there is any slowed or blurred movement it is not significant enough for your eye to see it.  The picture looks great in both HD and regular cable, we have 10 HD channels and all others are regular cable so we do watch it a lot on cable only channels.  I really don't understand why there are so many comments on the sound, it is the same as every other tv I have ever owned and I plan on eventually getting surround sound.  I had planned on doing it right away before I got the tv due to the comments on how bad the sound was, but after recieving it the sound is fine.  The shipping was fantastic, it arrived 3 days earlier than expected.  They called 2 days ahead to schedule a time, and the driver called when he was approximately 30 minutes away.
